arts.ttl: Sloppy USMNT performances to blame as U.S. loses yet another Gold Cup final to Mexico
arts.sum: The USMNT's first chance to win a trophy under coach Mauricio Pochettino slipped away as it played poorly against Mexico in the Gold Cup final.

arts.ttl: USMNT 1-2 Mexico: Player Ratings as El Tri Become 2025 Gold Cup Champions
arts.sum: Eventually, Marcel Ruiz played in a beautiful through-ball for Raúl Jiménez and the Fulham striker fired an absolute rocket into the roof of the net to bring El Tri level in the 27th minute. The USMNT struck four minutes into the match, Sebastian Berhalter sent in a deadly cross the Chris Richards got on the end of.

arts.ttl: Mauricio Pochettino's Side Falls Short in Gold Cup Final: Takeaways from Defeat vs. Mexico
arts.sum: The USMNT had a chance to rewrite the narratives heading into next year’s FIFA World Cup with a win against Mexico on the biggest stage Concacaf has to offer. The U.S. men’s national team knew the importance of winning the Concacaf Gold Cup final, but fell short to Mexico 2–1 in front of a sold-out crowd of over 72,000 in Houston.

arts.ttl: USMNT React to Mexico's Come-From-Behind Gold Cup Win
arts.sum: USMNT captain Tim Ream and former star player Alexei Lalas react to Gold Cup loss to Mexico.

arts.ttl: Mexico tops USA in Gold Cup final as Pochettino decries ‘embrassing’ penalty no-call
arts.sum: Mexico wins its 10th Gold Cup title, 2-1 in Houston US coach said hostile crowd influenced referees Mexico won the country’s 10th Gold Cup title, successfully defending the trophy they won in 2023 with a 2-1 win over the United States in front of a raucous, pro-Mexico crowd in Houston, Texas on Sunday. West Ham midfielder Edson Álvarez scored the decisive goal in the second half, heading home the winner after the ball deflected off the head of John Vásquez. Álvarez’s goal was initially ruled out for offside, but VAR intervened and determined that he was level with the last defender at the time Vásquez made contact, sparking jubilant celebrations on the field and in the stands. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Diogo Jota's ex-teammate Raul Jimenez pays emotional tribute to late friend in Mexico Gold Cup win over USMNT
arts.sum: Jota, who helped Liverpool win the Premier League title last season, and his younger brother were killed in a car accident close to the Portuguese border in northwestern Spain on Thursday.

arts.sum: The biggest rivalry in North American soccer reignites as the USMNT and Mexico face off in the 2025 Gold Cup final. Here's Sports Illustrated's combined XI ahead of the USMNT and Mexico's clash in the Gold Cup final.

arts.ttl: USMNT Predicted Lineup vs. Mexico: Biggest Test Yet for Pochettino
arts.sum: The U.S. men's national team takes on Mexico in the Concacaf Gold Cup final on Sunday, July 6 in Mauricio Pochettino's biggest test yet as head coach. Here's how the USMNT could line up against Mexico in the Gold Cup final.
